A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Dozens of huge plot holes
A rescue just in time / deus ex machina moment every 10 minutes
Side quests where nothing is accomplished and adds nothing to the plot (the entire casino planet story line)
Killing off major characters with no set up or back story whatsoever (Snoke)
Leia floating like freaking Mary Poppins through the vacuum space with no Force bubble / shield or anything
The two biggest powers in the galaxy (the Resistance & The First Order) fitting into about 3 ships and 6 AT-ATs
Space bombers that drop bombs that depend on gravity (and controlled with a garage door opener for good measure)
